blogPost.title: What are some secrets to negotiating good deals? Answer by @ThomasGolisano, founder & Chairman of @Paychex. https://t.co/dnREwR1iIg https://t.co/K1dIYOtRpg
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 良い取引をするための秘訣は何ですか？回答者：@ThomasGolisano（@Paychexの創業者＆会長） https://t.co/dnREwR1iIg https://t.co/K1dIYOtRpg
谈判好交易的秘诀是什么？由@Paychex的创始人&主席ThomasGolisano回答。https://t.co/dnREwR1iIg https://t.co/K1dIYOtRpg。
談判好交易的祕訣是什麼？由@Paychex的創始人&主席ThomasGolisano回答。https://t.co/dnREwR1iIg https://t.co/K1dIYOtRpg。

previous.title: What are some things people should look for in an interview? Answer by @AttaTarki, CEO of @ECA_Partners and the author of Evidence-Based Recruiting. https://t.co/QYVpiJgKum https://t.co/Nw3PgFYZos

localize.full_text: 大家在面试中应该注意哪些问题？回答者：@AttaTarki，@ECA_Partners的CEO，《循证招聘》的作者。https://t.co/QYVpiJgKum https://t.co/Nw3PgFYZos。
大家在面試中應該注意哪些問題？回答者：@AttaTarki，@ECA_Partners的CEO，《循證招聘》的作者。https://t.co/QYVpiJgKum https://t.co/Nw3PgFYZos。

next.title: What are some of your recommendations for removing cultural bias from IQ tests? Answer by @haw95, Author of A Terrible Thing to Waste. https://t.co/QGxGHvOY8t https://t.co/0UxevwHqER

localize.full_text: 对于消除智商测试中的文化偏见，你有什么建议？回答者：@haw95，《一件可怕的事》作者。https://t.co/QGxGHvOY8t https://t.co/0UxevwHqER。
對於消除智商測試中的文化偏見，你有什麼建議？回答者：@haw95，《一件可怕的事》作者。https://t.co/QGxGHvOY8t https://t.co/0UxevwHqER。
